author: stefano
msg: removing dependency on //depend/@version which is not a gump thing

author: stefano
msg: getting close to a clean gump run. fixed the PHP block which didn't depend on the mocks classes, fixed the chaperon refernce, removed the centipede-specific stuff (which isn't used and it's only confusing since gump ignores it), and a few other details.

author: coliver
msg: Improved error reporting and added XPath support. Unlike in JSTL, XPath expressions can be used everywhere Jexl expressions can. To make this possible XPath expressions are enclosed in {} rather than ${}

author: coliver
msg: don't lose line numbers in errors when running as a generator
